Task Adapter 1.0.23 is released

May 21, 2011 â€¢ Author: admin

Highlights:

    * Redmine: Added "default tracker type" setting to Redmine Editor. This type will be used by Task Adapter when creating new tasks in Redmine. * JIRA: Added support for "Affected Version", "Fix for version" and "Component" fields * JIRA: Added support for custom fields. * Many minor UI improvements and bugfixes
